summary: KVM: mmio: Fix use-after-free Read in kvm_vm_ioctl_unregister_coalesced_mmio
details:
KVM: mmio: Fix use-after-free Read in kvm_vm_ioctl_unregister_coalesced_mmio

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.4 by commit 069d44a24c0ff8f85adf49233aae7a8ca16f5c7e, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 5d3c4c79384af06e3c8e25b7770b6247496b4417. For more details please see the references link.
